name: Candy Swoosh - Candy Match
description:
Candy Swoosh is a simple yet addictive puzzle game.

Connect matching candy
Pair all candy and cover the entire board to solve each puzzle.


Free play through hundreds of levels, or race against the clock in Time Trial mode.

*FEATURES*

- Over 700 free levels available in Free Play mode
- 10 different board sizes
- Additional level packs available for purchase
- 20 scored Time Trial variants to choose from by board size and duration
- Clean, colorful graphics
- Fun sound effects
- Optimised for iPhones, iPods, iPads & iPhone 5!
